body.p: A manager or a QA lab technician might record multiple downtimes or need to edit downtime types and reasons for downtimes entered by either line operators or auto-detection.

The instructions below are steps for viewing reported downtime in Sight Machine.
On the Data tab, select Downtime from the Update Menu to toggle the Update Menu options to downtime-specific choices.
Click to select details from the Update Menu and click Update. Machine downtime data displays according to your criteria.
